column3:
Uin Nee hopes to bring a touch of opulence to Lyhe Mheg.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Obtain a shiny pebble southeast of the Bookman's Shelves.
Deliver the shiny pebble to Uin Nee.

Rubies! Emeralds! Sapphires! Oh, how they sparkle! Not that we have many chances to see them here in Il Mheg. From what I hear, they're very valuable, which must be why the scavengers work so hard to dig them up.
That's given me another brilliant idea! We should decorate Lyhe Mheg with jewels of our own!
Of course, we don't need to go through all the trouble of finding real gemstones, just something with a vague resemblance. Our magic will do the rest!
You look like you've got time to spare. Why don't you make yourself useful and collect some nice, shiny pebbles for me?
There should be some down by the lake. And if you see any Fuath, give them a whack from me!
Come on then, hand it over!
Well, it's a bit plain, but I suppose it'll do. I might even be able to turn pebbles like these into gold coins, so the children can see how it feels to be rich!
Of course, it will all disappear when they wake up, but they can enjoy it while the dream lasts. Even if they're penniless in real life, they'll live like royalty in Lyhe Mheg!
